ygData.msgSnippet: Straight Shot shrugs him off as does Rattrap.  Oh well, Rattrap, when Tucson gets back things will be different.  I highly doubt Dinobot or anyone else wants

Straight Shot shrugs him off as does Rattrap.

" Oh well, Rattrap, when Tuc=
son gets back things will be different.  I highly doubt Dinobot or anyone e=
lse wants ta get tangled up with my brother when he's in a bad mood.  If he=
 was here right now, just one look into his narrowed eyes would immediately=
 halt the behaviors we just saw right now.   Leo knows him best so he doesn=
't usually lose it around him but if he was here at this moment, he would h=
ave a lot of us turning a nice shade of white right about now."

Rattrap no=
ds.

" Yeah, true.  Leo , Sir, I think this ain't gonna work too well witho=
ut the big guy here.  We really need ta find him.  No offense but, he's the=
 one who put this together and I don't think Hydras can keep things in line=
 without that extra boost from Wings.  Two dragons are better than one, and=
 right now we need that balance."

Straight Shot raises a brow.

" Two drag=
ons are better than one....  Master Yoketron once said that when he was tra=
ining my brother and Nightshift.  Leo, That's it!  Rattrap's right!  We nee=
d ta find my brother before all else!  Hydras!  You'll think I'm off my roc=
ker but believe me if Master Yoketron said this it's gotta be true!  Two dr=
agons are better than one.  One representing good and the other representin=
g evil.  One balances out the other and together they form a power which ca=
n stand to be undefeated.  It's an old tale but it applies here.  Leo, plea=
se trust me on this, because it could really depend on how things play out.=
  You gotta find my brother and bring him back here.. ta Hydras.  Hydras, y=
ou and Tucson are those dragons.  Together you can form a powerful bond tha=
t no other force can defeat.  Not even Magmatron.  Okay that might be pushi=
ng it but it's so worth a try."
Perpetually on the move and constantly busy=
. 

On Oct 27, 2011, at 2:14 AM, "adamsafran" <adamsafran@...> wrote:=


> 
> 
> > 
> > Quickstride narrows his eyes and puts his ears aback.
> > =

> > " Then why the pit did ya start on Rattrap when ya know damn well that=
 you are in the company of Maximals? That was dumb on your part."
> 
> DINO=
BOT grinned, "To see if they had changed at all. Instead, I see merely that=
 they continue the disintegration of their own cause, and if anything it ha=
s progressed faster. You are like an infestation of scraplets, projecting a=
ll faults outwards to others and in denial of your own contributions. The r=
at lead to my death, and I believe under any right I have to be upset with =
him, even by Maximal standards. And then your friend here drew her weapons =
and threatened to assault me when you had called us here for a truce. You M=
aximals stated you needed our help, and then one of your member escalates a=
nd threatens assault. The rodent led to my termination, I believe I have ca=
use for candor with him. In his defense, if you call it such a thing, your =
little friend powered up her weapons systems an threatened me." 
> 
> HIssi=
ng, continuing as his sword was back in it's storage compartment. "That is =
escalation, all on the part of your own troops. Now you on top of that are =
threatening again. That is two escalations on the part o the Maximals, who =
claim moral superiority. A Predacon at the very least if he disagreed would=
 not have made such a show of things. They would have been forthright where=
 they stood. There woudl have been no gamesmechship. Instead, you call us h=
ere for a truce, come off as instigating a fight, and then put all of it WH=
EN YOU ARMED YOUR WEAPONS upon my spark." Snorting, "That is somehow all my=
 fault now, when I only drew my own saber after I had been directly targete=
d." Laughing, "And are you going to attack me again when the Rodent baited =
me, your friend threatened to attempt to attack me, and even now the two of=
 them continue to belittle and threaten me within audial receiver range? Oh=
, and speak of how I am to get my cumuppance from them and such? Truly, wha=
t are they, freshly sparked protoforms to utter such nonsense if this is tr=
uly such a critical event that only our alliance would stop it that they wi=
sh to instigate an altercation and then suffer no consequences for it, and =
put all of the responsibility upon another. That extends to your faction, y=
our politics as a whole. That is why you have made Cybertron rotten to the =
core."
> 
> Hissing, "Now, restrain your whelps and do not let them belittl=
e me further or at least have the candor if they wish to do so to do upon a=
 field of battle." Turning back to Hydras and awaiting orders then.
> 
> 

--Apple-Mail-59--29452356

DINOBOT grinned, "To see if they had changed at all.  Instead, I se=
e merely that they continue the disintegration of their own cause, and if a=
nything it has progressed faster.  You are like an infestation of scraplets=
, projecting all faults outwards to others and in denial of your own contri=
butions.  The rat lead to my death, and I believe under any right I have to=
 be upset with him, even by Maximal standards.  And then your friend here d=
rew her weapons and threatened to assault me when you had called us here fo=
r a truce.  You Maximals stated you needed our help, and then one of your m=
ember escalates and threatens assault.  The rodent led to my termination, I=
 believe I have cause for candor with him.  In his defense, if you call it =
such a thing, your little friend powered up her weapons systems an threaten=
ed me."  <br>
<br>
HIssing, continuing as his sword was back in it's storag=
e compartment.  "That is escalation, all on the part of your own troops. No=
w you on top of that are threatening again.  That is two escalations on the=
 part o the Maximals, who claim moral superiority.  A Predacon at the very =
least if he disagreed would not have made such a show of things.  They woul=
d have been forthright where they stood.  There woudl have been no gamesmec=
hship.  Instead, you call us here for a truce, come off as instigating a fi=
ght, and then put all of it WHEN YOU ARMED YOUR WEAPONS upon my spark."  Sn=
orting, "That is somehow all my fault now, when I only drew my own saber af=
ter I had been directly targeted."  Laughing, "And are you going to attack =
me again when the Rodent baited me, your friend threatened to attempt to at=
tack me, and even now the two of them continue to belittle and threaten me =
within audial receiver range?  Oh, and speak of how I am to get my cumuppan=
ce from them and such?  Truly, what are they, freshly sparked protoforms to=
 utter such nonsense if this is truly such a critical event that only our a=
lliance would stop it that they wish to instigate an altercation and then s=
uffer no consequences for it, and put all of the responsibility upon anothe=
r.  That extends to your faction, your politics as a whole.  That is why yo=
u have made Cybertron rotten to the core."<br>
<br>
Hissing, "Now, restrain=
 your whelps and do not let them belittle me further or at least have the c=
andor if they wish to do so to do upon a field of battle."  Turning back to=
 Hydras and awaiting orders then.<br>
